narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 15-year-old female was last seen at Norfolk at 2025-10-03T21:56:49.590254+00:00. The child was reported missing by friend after failing to return home.

narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 6 hours of disappearance, movement cues turned onto US-58 east toward Suffolk suggest travel southbound along US-58. A dark blue 2012 Toyota Camry was observed departing near Norfolk, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 6 hours later, a neighbor reported someone matching the description (15-year-old female, wearing gray jacket, navy sweatpants, black sneakers) near Harrisonburg.

provenance._fulltext: A 15-year-old female was last seen at Norfolk at 2025-10-03T21:56:49.590254+00:00. The child was reported missing by friend after failing to return home. Within 6 hours of disappearance, movement cues turned onto US-58 east toward Suffolk suggest travel southbound along US-58. A dark blue 2012 Toyota Camry was observed departing near Norfolk, Virginia. Around 6 hours later, a neighbor reported someone matching the description (15-year-old female, wearing gray jacket, navy sweatpants, black sneakers) near Harrisonburg.
